document_data.name: Nerrol Hamastyl
document_data.mainbody: High Steward '''Nerrol Hamastyl''' was a [[half-elf]] [[ranger]] and [[paladin]], and was the High Steward of the [[Royal Council of Aglarond]] as of [[1374 DR]]. The council's duty was to appoint representatives of the cities and provinces of [[Aglarond]], and Hamastyl was representative of [[the Simbul]] at the council, except at times when the Simbul appeared herself.
